de.db.derPate.model

Class UsernamePasswordLogin

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.db.derPate.model.LoginUser
      • de.db.derPate.model.UsernamePasswordLogin
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Admin, Godfather

    public abstract class UsernamePasswordLogin
extends LoginUser
    Abstract class that is used by all classes, that are using email and password as login credentials.
    Author:
    MichelBlank
    See Also:
    LoginUser

        Email may not be null.

      • getPassword

        public @Nullable java.lang.String getPassword()
        Returns hashed password.
        Might be null, if this object was intended to only hold data, that might be displayed.
        Returns:
        Password or null

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(@Nullable java.lang.String password)
        Sets the password.
        Parameters:
        password - Password to be set or null, if object should no longer be used for login

      • removeSecret

        public void removeSecret()
        Removes the password from this object to ensure, that it cannot be read afterwards. This method is used by the LoginManager.login(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, LoginUser).
        Specified by:
        removeSecret in class LoginUser
        See Also:
        LoginManager.login(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, LoginUser)
